#BlackMagicCraft #Episode082


In this episode I share with you a cool technique for getting even better stone texture on your xps foam using the Hotwire Foam Factory engraving tool and some aluminum foil. 

(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)

BUY a PROXXON HOTWIRE CUTTER:

Canada - http://amzn.to/2pWazXF
